name: dom-node-template
description: create usefull html or svg element wrapper object with es6 template string.

scripts.clean:dir: rm -rf ./build && mkdir build && npm run sound:trash
scripts.build: clear; npm install && npm run clean:dir && npm run babelrc:build && npm run babel && npm run sound:microwave
scripts.build:server: npm install && npm run clean:dir && npm run babelrc:build && npm run babel
scripts.test: clear; npm run clean:dir && npm run babelrc:mocha && npm run babel && mocha --require babel-core/register --require jsdom-global/register --
scripts.test:inspect: clear; npm run clean:dir && npm run babelrc:mocha && npm run babel && mocha --require babel-core/register --require jsdom-global/register --inspect-brk --watch --
scripts.test:all: clear; npm run clean:dir && npm run babelrc:mocha && npm run babel && mocha --require babel-core/register --require jsdom-global/register && npm run sound:plock
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test:all && npm run  build
